intro: Lyonsia celebica, commonly known as the Celebes lyonsia, is a flowering plant native to the Indonesian island of Sulawesi. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias, and is characterized by its small, clustered flowers. The plant typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 3 meters. Its leaves are opposite, elliptical, and have a smooth texture, while its flowers are usually white or pale pink. It is often found in moist, shaded areas of tropical forests, where it thrives in the undergrowth.
